name: General
questions: What are you looking forward to this week?
What's a quote that changed your perspective?
What's a long term goal that you are working on?
What's a piece of advice that you rarely have a chance to give?
What's the best advice you've ever received, and who gave it to you?
What's a hobby or interest you have that most people don't know about?
What's your favorite picture/video of your pet?
If you could bring back one trend from the past, what would it be?
What's the most memorable gift you've ever given or received?
What's something you thought you'd hate but ended up loving?
If you had to create a new holiday, what would it celebrate and how?
What's the weirdest food combination you secretly enjoy?
What's the worst book, show, or video game that you have finished?
What volunteering opportunity do you recommend?
What's a food that, if blended, would make an unconventional yet delicious soup?
What free things should everyone take advantage of?
What's a hack in your industry that customers aren't supposed to find out?
Where do you meet new people?
What's a skill you've always wanted to learn but haven't gotten around to yet?
If your life had a soundtrack, what would be the title of the current chapter's theme song?
What's something you were absolutely convinced of as a child that turned out to be hilariously wrong?
What's a small hill you're willing to die on that most people wouldn't care about?
What's the most interesting 'rabbit hole' you've fallen down recently?
What's an obscure fact you know that surprises people when you share it?

name: Local
questions: What's your favorite museum or art exhibit that you visited?
What's your favorite outdoors-y place?
What's a local restaurant (and possibly a dish) you would recommend?
What's a local brewery you recommend?
What's the most underrated state park in Minnesota?
Do you actually enjoy going to the Mall of America?
What was your most recent "Uff da" moment?
What's the most 'Minnesota' thing you've ever experienced?
What's your go-to activity when showing out-of-town visitors around?
Which local festival or event do you look forward to the most?

name: Entertainment
questions: What's a book, movie, or show that completely changed your perspective on something?
If you could live in any fictional world for a week, where would you go?
What's the most interesting documentary or podcast you've watched/listened to recently?
What's a small YouTube channel that deserves more love?
What's an indie game that you think everyone should play?
What's your "comfort" gameâ€”the one you always go back to when you just want to relax?
What's a piece of media that you wish would get a prequel or sequel?
What's your favorite video game boss?
What game do you have the most time in? Would you recommend it?
What's your favorite world/environment from a piece of media?
What's one change you would make to a popular piece of media that would make it way better?

name: LGBTQ+
questions: What's a piece of LGBTQ+ media that really resonated with you?
What gives you gender euphoria?
What's a tradition or celebration in your life that feels uniquely meaningful to you?
What's something you wish more people understood about your experience?
If you could make one LGBTQ+ book/movie/show required reading/viewing, what would it be?
What's a stereotype about your identity that you'd love to debunk?
What's a compliment related to your identity that really meant a lot to you?
If you could design the perfect Pride parade float, what would be its theme?
What aspect of transitioning has surprised you?

name: Convince Me
questions: Convince me that a physical book is an objectively better experience than an e-reader in every meaningful way, not just a nostalgic preference.
Convince me there is one, single, objectively correct way to load a dishwasher, and all other methods are chaos.
Convince me that a manual transmission car is still the superior driving experience, even in rush-hour traffic.
Convince me that the 'found footage' genre is the most creative and immersive form of horror filmmaking, not a lazy gimmick.
Convince me that reality TV competitions (Survivor, The Great British Bake Off, etc.) are modern society's most effective vehicle for studying human nature.
Convince me that Daylight Saving Time is a brilliant and beneficial system that we should absolutely keep.
Convince me that I need an air fryer in my kitchen, and that it will change my cooking life forever.
